title: 3 and Out - “Safe Pick” Myth, Baker Overreaction, Russ/Broncos Questions
itunes:title: 3 and Out - “Safe Pick” Myth, Baker Overreaction, Russ/Broncos Questions
description:
John breaks down the myth of the “safe” draft pick, why the NFL doesn’t need a play in tournament style to create urgency, why he doesn’t have a problem with Baker’s recent podcast appearance venting about the Browns, if the dog is OK, and why he’s not as  bullish on Russell Wilson and the Broncos as the public.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
